name: Find My Agent User and Switch my Theme
author: Ricardo Carvalho

sections.description:
As said up there, this plugin discover the device the user of your website is using, and according with the
theme you choose (under appearance => Find my agent-user and switch my theme), switch to a theme more of your like.

Visit the plugin page

Donations

If you like…
sections.installation:
To install the plugin is very easy:

  1. Upload the folder ‘find_my_agent_user_and_switch_my_theme’ to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory;
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
  3. Select your mobile theme under appearance tab, ‘Find my agent-user and switch my theme’ label;
  4. ‘É isso aí!’ That’s all folks.
sections.faq:
Why my english is so bad?

It’s because i’m Brazilian Guy, and never studied correctly! So, forgive-me if write something weird. ^^
